data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 the trading window for dealing in Securities of Company shall remain remain closed with effect from August 26 2025 and shall re-open after 48 hours from the announcement of the financial results of the company for the Quarter ended June 30 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Vikram Solar Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 26 2025 the equity shares of Vikram Solar Ltd (Scrip Code: 544488) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250825- dated August 25 2025.
